summary: FIRST STARTED OUT A COUPLE OF MONTHS AGO.  HEADLIGHTS WOULD FLICKER OFF AND THEN BACK ON.  I FIGURED IT WAS NOTHING.  NOW THE HEADLIGHTS FLICKER EVERY 30-60 SECONDS, CAN NOT DRIVE VEHICLE AT NIGHT, HAVE ALREADY BEEN PULLED OVER BY POLICE BECAUSE OF IT.  I EXPLAINED TO THE OFFICER THERE MUST BE A PROBLEM WITH THE HEADLIGHTS.  *JB
